data.title: Grandall Law Firm
data.meta_description: Grandall Law Firm is a Law Firm. Their ICLG contributions focus on Lending & Secured Finance
data.meta_site_name: International Comparative Legal Guides International Business Reports
data.text:
Grandall Law Firm, previously known as “Grandall Legal Group”, was established in June 1998 and has since emerged as an international law firm with a presence across 35 offices in major cities worldwide. With offices in prominent locations such as Beijing, Shenzhen, Shanghai, Hangzhou, Guangzhou and New York, Grandall Law Firm is strategically positioned to cater to clients' legal needs on a global scale.

As the first law firm authorised by the Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China to utilise the title "Legal Group", Grandall Law Firm has continually evolved to meet the demands of the legal landscape.

Grandall Law Firm comprises a team of over 680 partners and a workforce exceeding 5,000 individuals, including practising attorneys, paralegals, administrative assistants, and support personnel. Notably, more than 90% of the firm's partners hold advanced degrees, including Doctorates or Master's degrees, alongside other esteemed qualifications.

With its specialised knowledge, standardised management system, global presence, and esteemed brand, Grandall Law Firm stands as a leading force in the legal arena. The firm's expertise spans various practice areas, with a particular focus on banking and financial legal services.

Practice Areas

The firm provides services across an array of practice areas encompassing capital markets, civil and commercial dispute resolution, criminal law, banking and finance, investment and mergers and acquisitions, investment funds and private equity, bankruptcy and liquidation, corporate operation, compliance, construction and real estate, projects and infrastructures, environment, energy and natural resources, intellectual property, science technology, telecommunications and internet, antitrust and competition law, international trade, maritime, tax law and customs, government and public affairs, family wealth management, labour law, healthcare and life science, culture, media and sports.

In its capacity as a premier banking and financial legal services provider, Grandall Law Firm has facilitated numerous transactions for a diverse clientele. This includes domestic and international trust companies, commercial banks, investment banks, financial institutions, asset management firms and government agencies. The firm's comprehensive range of services encompasses routine legal matters for international commercial credit, commercial banks, project financing, financial leasing, syndicated loans, financing guarantees, trusts, asset securitisation, non-performing assets and financial innovation.

History

Grandall Law Firm was established through the merger of three prominent law firms: Beijing Zhang Yongtao Law Firm, Shanghai Wanguo Law Firm, and Shenzhen Tangren Law Firm. Registered with the Ministry of Justice, each of these three firms had established themselves as key players in the legal arena prior to the merger.

Awards

The firm has received an array of awards and accolades from various legal ranking bodies and organisations, including IFLR1000, LEGALBAND, asialaw, China Business Law Journal, Benchmark Litigation among many others. The firm has been recognised across various practice areas, including corporate/commercial, dispute resolution, securities and capital markets, banking and finance, investment funds and M&A.
